episode.title: Start a Bakin’ Timer
episode.rawTitle: 259: ‘Start a Bakin’ Timer’ With Marco Arment
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Marco Arment returns to the show. Topics include MacBook Pro rumors, breakfast cereal, Siri frustrations, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Marco Arment returns to the show. Topics include MacBook Pro rumors, breakfast cereal, Siri frustrations, and more.
